story:
Short Summary

In life, all that I've ever wanted to do is create a lasting legacy so that my songs, my words, my melodies, and my heart lives on far after I'm gone. 

Born and raised in Bel Air, Maryland, I moved to New York City when I was 18 and was captivated by the culture and life of a place that until that point had been some unachievable Narnia, where legends are made and most fade into obscurity. 

I started a band called "Schucks Road", and we recorded and released an EP called 'One By Land'. For me, it was one of the crowning achievements of my life. For so long I had wanted to make something meaningful, and it was an incredible feeling to have completed such a cathartic journey. We received fantastic reviews, made some wonderful new fans, and performed on stages where our heroes had stood years ago. 

If you know me, then you know that Schucks Road eventually ran its course, as did my time in New York City. I left to return to Baltimore, taking with me the experiences and the sounds of the past six years spent in a city that once felt unattainable.

Looking to new horizons, I'm heading to Los Angeles, and I want to take this collection of songs with me. Every song on this EP means a whole lot to me, and I hope that upon listening, they'll mean a lot to you as well. They are a culmination of my experiences in New York, my life in Baltimore, those I've known, the things I've lost, and the things I've gained. They tell a story about rising back up, no matter how hard you fall. I need for them to be heard, and I can only do it with your help.

What We Need & What You Get

Without you, none of this will be possible. We've been hard at work in a beautiful studio on Long Island crafting, creating, and recording these songs. Help us bring them to you. To help you understand the cost, this is where the money will be used:

  • Studio time for recording.
  • Paying session musicians so that we can have the best sounding record possible. This includes drums, strings, brass instruments, and more. We're going big on this EP.
  • Mixing and mastering the album to give it the radio-quality sound.
  • Creation of merchandise, pressing of CDs, and maintenance of the website. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help! There are some small things that you can do that will go a BIG way:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about the campaign!
  • Share the video and link on Facebook, Youtube, Twitter, shout the URL from the roofs, scream it at people in the streets, whatever it takes.
  • Beg and convince other people to donate. Guilt them into it. Bribe them.
  • Check out the new music as it's released, spread the word about it, be a fan and join the mailing list!

story:
What is PHILLA'15 ?

Philadelphia's own networking showcase

"We wanted to create a music showcase that was different from all the other open mic styled showcases and college tours, something more focused specifically to Philadelphia"

The Underground Crowned team believes that the independent music scene in Philadelphia holds an extreme amount of talent, a lot of which goes unrecognized. 

We know that there is already an abundant amount of showcases in Philadelphia, but we wanted to create an atmosphere that we've never seen before. An event where you walk in knowing you will walk out with arrangements to work with another artist in a song, or have a cinematographer approach you telling you they want to shoot your next video. 

We know that one of the most important things to do for your career, as an artist, producer, photographer, cinematographer, or manager is to NETWORK. 

That is what PHILLA'15 is here to do, help you expand your network. 

We want to pack the crowd with producers, engineers, managers, artists, journalists, anyone who has a part in the music industry so you can...

  • Meet other like minded, talented, driven individuals 
  • Scout talent for your next project

What do we need the money for?

"An event like this needs the perfect venue"
Underground Crowned is an up and coming non-profit blog, meaning although we want to fund PHILLA'15 all by ourselves... it's not in budget. 
Luckily we have stumbled across many generous people from Philadelphia who have contributed to the event. Contributing their time and services without compensation. 
We have people performing, dj-ing, hosting, doing graphics, promotions, catering, providing alcohol (for 21+ guests), working on budget, photography, cinematography, designers raffling off their work for free. All that and more going into the preparation for this showcase. Without compensation. 
We would like to be able to break off every person who contributes to PHILLA'15
Any funds left over will go to all print items like flyers, tickets and business cards. Money will also be put towards buying and LLC for Underground Crowned and other website costs. We want to be able to sell work for the artists and help promote through our blog. We also will put left over funds towards other projects and events that our site presents. 

What do you get?

If you help us, we will help you. That's what we are all about, building community. 

If you contribute, email us at ugcrowned@gmail.com and let's chat about ways we can promote you or your company through our social medias. 

Instagram: www.instagram.com/UGCrowned

Twitter: www.twitter.com/Undrgrndcrowned

Website: www.undergroundcrowned.com

  • Any songs/beats you created can be played during downtime at our event, giving you a chance to be heard by the same influential crowd as the performers themselves. 
  • We can come out to your event and document it for promotion on our social media. 
  • A future feature/interview on our website.  
  • promotions promotions promotions

Can't fund us? That's fine, how else can you contribute?

PROMOTE, PROMOTE, PROMOTE

We are always looking for....

  • Photographers 
  • Videographers
  • Journalists
  • Bloggers
  • Any media personalities 
...to come out and enjoy our show. Take pictures, record it and throw it on youtube or something. We need your help to get the word out. Email us at ugcrowned@gmail.com 
We'd love to have you there.

story:
First off... WHY?

After overcoming line-up changes, throat tumors, and re-forming a band... it would be terrible to have money be the reason we wouldn't be able to showcase in front labels, booking agents, and radio giants during Music Week in Austin this year! 

10% of your donation will be donated to either The Human Rights Campaign, The Humane Society, The Cystic Fibrosis Foundation, or Breast Cancer Awareness. If you do not specify in the Notes of your Payment where you wish the donation to go, it will be split evenly amongst the four. 

What Do My Donations Go Toward (Other Than The Awesome Perks I'll Receive?
Your generous donations will go toward paying for the awesome Perks we have for you, and 10% of your donations will go to one of four charities you may choose from! The proceeds from this campaign will go toward transportation and fuel expenses, hotel accommodations, necessary merchandise, insurance, road gear (extra strings, picks, sticks), and promotions. Since our Perks are so unique, and unusual, some of them are pretty expensive to get our hands on, so we are asking for the bare minimum we need for this venture. If we go above and beyond our goal, it will really help the tour be much more successful!


THE SHOW:  A retrospect by Taylor Young. 

A melodic guitar driven band with haunting lyrics that burn right through you. They have been compared to the likes of Oasis, Death Cab For Cutie, Radiohead and The Stone Roses. Many critics have seen a number of likenesses in their music but as their fans well know, they are their own animal with a very unique and polished sound that is captivating.

What makes The Show such a special band? The stranger dichotomy of two polar opposite singer songwriters born on opposite sides of The US. One from the deserts of the West and the other from the rich haunted woods of the East. The marriage of words and music seems an unlikely fit but it works effortlessly. To complete them is the unstoppable rhythm section that keeps the blood pumping.

They have played anywhere they can. Reaching as far as the UK and Ireland. What you might not know about the show is that everything that they've taken on, they have done alone. No label, no financial backing. They work day jobs. They have sacrificed greatly to keep this wonderful music coming to their fans. They know fans are the very life force of what your band is capable of doing. Those wonderful fans have helped them accomplish so much. Their campaign video has just a few of the countless testimonies from there incredibly loyal fans.

I am honored to call myself a fan of The Show and not be able to contribute financially, they have done me the deep honor in letting me contribute in the best way that I know how. With my humble words. I hope from the bottom of my heart that you get them to Music Week in Austin Texas! Home of the very influential SXSW showcase. This is the ultimate chance for this astounding band to get true exposure! To play in front of label scouts, press and also more importantly fans like you. This could be a real chance for them.  [TJY]

HOW CAN I HELP?
The first thing you can do is share this video link with everyone you know...

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NzxeHJ_qgck     


Tell everyone you know about the campaign. Share it with your friends and family. It will only take a couple of minutes out of your day but it could mean a life-changing outcome for us.

The next thing you can do is CONTRIBUTE. Help us raise the funds to get to Music Week. No donation is too small. Every donation will help!

Money is not the only thing you can give to help us succeed. Give them your encouragement! Join us for the updates on the campaign, comment, let us know you are out there and most importantly tell your friends! Share the campaigns link on Facebook and on Twitter...  (Or Google +, and MySpace... we don't judge!)

http://igg.me/at/theshow 

Follow this link to THE SHOW on Facebook...
http://www.facebook.com/TheShowOfficial

"Like" and share your encouragement there! There are many ways you can help!


WHATS IN IT FOR YOU AS A CONTRIBUTOR?
If you're thinking: "why wouldn't I just use the money to buy these perks myself?", we have thought of that too. We have taken the time to find things that not everyone can do themselves. For example:

Do you play guitar or bass? Have you ever wanted your very own personalized one of a kind Gibson, Fender or Rickenbacker?! Let the band help you build your dream guitar! [We will buy it for you too!]


Have you ever wanted to have your own personalized bottle of wine, with a custom label?

Have you ever wanted custom M&Ms with graphics and text of your choosing?

Have you ever wanted someone to write a song just for you?

Have you ever wanted to go to Colorado (where they've passed a great new law) and hang with a member of The Show while we experience a new chapter of a greener America?

Have us do a live performance just for you?

Or even go on the road with us and see firsthand the excitement of Music Week in Austin Texas?!!!

Recently unreleased material. Signed drumsticks and albums and much more.
Make sure you check all of our perks for details. Also and most importantly 10% of what they raise will go directly back to the community to whatever charity you choose.

THANK YOU AND STAY WITH US!
Stay with us throughout campaign. Login for new updates and leave your comments. Don't forget to share with your friends. Your encouragement and support will be what gets them there. Enable them to go to Music Week in Austin Texas and say that YOU sent them there! Thank you for all your support!!!!!!!

story:
Hi, My name is David May.   I write and record music under the name The Purple Kite.
I am wanting to raise money to record my second EP and cover touring costs.
These Funds will help me to be able to cover  travel, merchandise, and lodging needs in the US and abroad.   My passion is to connect with people and share moments of life through the vehicle of music.
Through your support, I will be able to realize a lifelong dream of writing, performing and touring my music across the US and abroad.   I am  trying to answer the question.   "What would life look like with no regrets?"  
I am looking to raise $50,000 to be able to have the resource to begin to tour my debut EP to coffee houses, homes and bookstores all across the US and abroad.   This funding will go to travel expenses: plane tickets,  gas , food, lodging , transportation while on tour this year.
I have a whole list of perks to offer at various levels of investment.    From a shoutout on Twitter to a full house concert with The Purple Kite and various things  in between.
If I do not reach the  entire goal,  I will still be able to keep what has been raised as I am  doing the Flexible Funding option.
I believe every life is an incredible journey and every journey needs a soundtrack.  I am actively looking for ways to be that soundtrack for the lives  of friends and new friends that I meet along the way.   

    I think the biggest challenge that I face is being a new artist with no track record yet.  The goal of this campaign is to create community around the common love of music.  I am so thankful to those of you who partner with me  to help make this dream a reality.  If this has sparked your curiosity, please pass it on through Social Media and the INDIEGOGO  Share Tools that are available.   

Thank you,
David May

story:
Hello Friends,
I am Elda Neiferra singer/songwriter independent artist living in Los Angeles. Raising money to produce my debute short EP. You will get Super Awesome perks, read below in category - What We Need $ & What You Get </>

BIO

I was born and raised in Cherkasy city Ukraine. When I was 4 years old my parents bought me a toy piano and a toy guitar this started me on my path of a musical career. My father taught me how to play the piano one finger at a time. My mother would sing Ukrainian folk songs to me and they tell me when I first started speaking I would sing the words instead of speaking the words, they still tell me to this day how crazy it drove them that I would sing my words instead of speaking :)) On my 10th birthday my father bought me an old German Piano more than 100 years old this piano I still have and have spent many hours playing and writing music. My music teacher realized my passion and talent for music and put me on a fast track getting my creative mind working very well. In 1999 I wrote my first song for piano it was a classical song. In 2001 I start to play acoustic guitar by ear and write songs in English. In 2002 I began to perform at live events, some were charity events, some were at church events and some were in the local theater concert hall, it was every fun for me at this time in my life, but I did not make any money from my performances. In 2004 I started to play electric guitar and write songs for guitars.

What We Need & What You Get

In this next chapter in my life to make an short debut EP I need to raise $15,000. This donated thru Indiegogo money is very special to me. I have some money, but I am still this much short to be able to complete my EP album. Here is how the money will be utilized. I have two studios with excellent Grammy award music producers: one is Corky James @ www.corkyjames.net  worked with popstars as Kelly Clarkson, Avril Lavigne, Katy Perry and many others and the other producer Earl Cohen @ www.earlcohenproductions.com worked with many pop stars as Lady Gaga, Tina Turner, Usher, Pink, Whitney Houston, Nelly and many more... Check their web sites. The $15,000 will be used for these two studios to produce my debut short EP, it will contain 2 original singles and 3 covers. Two covers will have my lyrics, music that I'm using for covers written by talented violinist Lindsey Stirling.

I have third video a cover "Lady Wolf" (music "Minimal beat" by Lindsey Stirling, lyrics by me) I already have almost done, you can see video clips in my campaign  video.  The art work, making the disc, advertising budget we already have. We are shooting videos for each original songs, I have already raised the funds for these videos with the help of David Cunningham, but I am very short on money for the music side of the business, with your help I will be able to achieve my goals.

Just as I did in Ukraine I will be donating a portion of the sales of the album to charity here in USA.

If I will not be able to reach the goal $15,000 to make my short EP, still I will be making minimum one single, and making video for this single. So - In You Guys I Trust!!!!!

I'm a lucky girl to be already on a reality show in USA, this show about immigrants artists - singers, actors, who trying to make their American Dream come true, pursue their careers here in USA. I have a contract with video production company, and they already shoot episodes with me. I can not tell you any more details right now.

Perks: 

Be ready for adventures with me!!!!!!!

You will get: Main thing - if you will buy perk to be in reality show - you will be my friend or my fan in this show. I invite you to be a reality show star together with me!!!!!! Director of show already agreed with me to bring my friends and fans to show!!! Yaah!!!! And even if you don't know what to do on camera, don't worry - you will be just yourself, and video guys will tell you what to do. Cool!!!!!!! 

Reality show following me around the USA, if I'll be staying on West coast you have to be close to LA location, or if your just rich and can travel anywhere. Same situation with East coast - if I'm on East coast you need to be able to come to us :):)

Here another Cool Perk - to be with me in studio with Corky James or Earl Cohen - you choose what you like more or where you can be in LA or New York.

Next very fun thing - perk to be in my new music videos!!! One video has more drama, I need many people to be with me on set. It will be movie like video with car crash and other drama. Another is comedy - about crazy student's life - it will be very very fun!!!!!! Show me your Wild side!!!! So you decide where you wanna be, what you can play better. Check quantity of places in perks on the right.

Other perks: exclusive things - costumes from"It is not my war" song. Check out my video to see the costumes.

You can get cool Wolf tattoo sleeve with my fan base name printed on it - "Elda's Creatures", or "Neiferrian" so you will be my official Neiferrian fan-creature!!!! You choose what print you like. If you will buy Wolf tattoo sleeve with print "Elda's Creatures VIP #--- "(with number) or "Neiferrian VIP # ---(with number) it means you will be a VIP at my concerts for free!!!!!!

Elda's Creatures Neiferrian - special kind of people, they are very special for me, they are different. Be Different!!!! because it's more fun!!!!!

For people with disabilities, handicaps and disabled veterans - tickets for my concerts are free!!!!!!!

Check my campaign video how you can wear Tattoo sleeve, my fans will show the right way to wear it :))

And other good stuff - downloads of my singles prior release date two weeks, signed CD's with thank you note, signed head shots.

Another nice perk - spend time with me in a nice LA restaurant (I will pay for dinner). For this I think you need to be in LA area, because traveling is expensive, but if you can travel to LA - You are Welcome!!!!!!!!

Be my executive producer, your name will appear in credits on CD, or you can choose to be on credits in my music video!!!! Everything is possible in this world!!!! Just choose your perk!!!!

Risks & Challenges: NONE. Everything what I promised you will get.

Other Ways You Can Help

I know some of you simply can not help out right now with the money, but helping me spread the word to all your friends and people you know is just as valuable as the money is to me, so help me spread the word, through social sites, word of mouth, or any other cool crazy way to let people know about this campaign. And if you come up with a cool idea let us know maybe it will earn you a good perk if my manager likes it.

Charity work.
My moms friend Zina had a daughter Natasha  who had Cerebral palsy even though their were some organizations to help parents with children that had special needs there were not any organizations that focused specifically on cerebral palsy. Growing up with Natasha I felt a special urge to try and help her as much as I could. This is what lead me to participate in my first charity concert. Because of Natasha's needs and because Natasha was like a sister. Me, my Mom and Zina  decided to form a non-profit charity that focused on kids with cerebral palsy. The organization's name is Triada because three of us - me, my mom and Zina. The website is http://fondtriada.at.ua or check CBF Triada non-profit community organization Facebook page.
During this time I had many charity concerts to bring awareness of this crippling disease, but also to raise money and to get donations for medical equipment like wheel chairs and other equipment to help them exercise and strengthen there arms and legs. We also provided computer classes to educate disabled children and adults to use computers and be more social on internet. Triada organized festivals for disabled children and adults so they could make their dreams come true and show their talents by singing on stage. I petitioned the Cherkasy city government to asset with these concerts and to help with the needs of these children. This paid off very well we were able to get better medical treatment for these children, the charity assisted in providing food from our donors and I received inspirations for many songs during this time. We also received many award recognition for our work from the government. If you want to know more about my BIO and charity work read on my facebook page.

Why I moved to USA?
At one charity event I met David Cunningham (producer/director) who was in Ukraine on business, he was looking at locations for a movie and just happen to show up at our concert. I was already planning to do an album of my songs in Kiev, but David offered to pay for studio rental in Kiev if I donated a part of the proceeds from the sales of the CD/album back to the Charity. Of course I said "yes" this was like a dream come true, but before we could record David had a family emergency and had to return to California. A few months later David came back and we went to Kiev to record the album. The organization had more charity concerts and it was at this time we were able to get some Ukrainian celebrities to participate. I received advice from many of them if I did an album in English it would not sell very well in Ukraine, they said that I was at least ten years ahead of my time, this was very disappointing to me. I was at a cross roads, either I had to sing in Ukrainian so my album would have half a chance of selling or I had to come to America and pursue my American Dream. Well you know what happened I am here in the USA making my music. During this time I was living in USA I was fortunate to work as photo model, actress in commercials and comedy videos.

To improve my singing abilities I have worked with American Idol, X-Factor vocal coach Monica Margolis.

I have produced two music videos "It is not my War" and "Titanium/Pavane" The Piano Guys cover. Check my Youtube channel.

Miracles  of Life

First miracle birth of creature, I was the first baby that survived out of four, I had two older sisters and an older brother that all died in infancy. I was born pre-mature, coming into this earth smaller than a doll. When I was 18 months old I became very ill. Doctors told my parents that I had an immune system virus and that I needed a blood transfusion immediately or I would die. My father was professor in college so he asked his students to come and donate blood for me. I recovered from that and had no other problems until I was 14 and began entering my adolescence  years. At school the common practice was the nurse would give all students a medical examination to make sure we as children were developing correctly. The doctors became very concerned with my breast. The breast tissue was very hard and the doctors suspected I had cancerous tumors in my breast.  With the blood disorder I had at 18 months and now this they speculated that I had come into contamination from some of the Chernobyl fallout even though we lived far from the explosion. They did all kinds of test and could not establish that it was cancer or what was the hard tissue. My girlfriends always teased me that I had man boobs because they were so hard and firm. They would tease me in a fun way as kids do that I was a creature from outer space, but the way I was starting to grow it wasn't only my breast that were different but my hip bones were also out of place than normal teenager. You can imagine at this point my mind was telling me I really was different creature. Growing up with Natasha and her handicaps we formed the first CREATURE CLUB, I was big creature and she was little creature.

Second miracle is the gift of tongues/language with just basic understanding and speaking English language I received inspiration on lyrics and melody in English. I didn't understand what I was writing so I took the transcripts to some Americans at church that were visiting and asked them to tell me if what I wrote was proper. The American's said everything was written correctly and it was a very good song.This gift was given to me at the same time I set up the charity. For the longest time I thought why did I understand and learn in English, then I understood when I came to America it was because I was coming to America.

Third miracle is I met David Cunningham and he brings me to USA. Now David is my manager. When I first arrived David took me to doctors to have my health checked. When I was child I had my adenoids taken out, and have had some nasal problems ever since (two times I broke my nose), so one doctor looked at my nose to fix it, another doctor checked everything else and on his report he wrote that "he never seen before hip bones 2 inches higher than normal" this doctor also examined my breast and confirmed there was no lumps or tumors, but just very solid breast tissue, and it was attached to my chest in different, not usual way. He said that he never seen before boobs are growing in weird way :)) So I commented on that, that I'm not surprised, because I'm a Creature :)))
story_txt:
Hello Friends,I am Elda Neiferra singer/songwriter independent artist living in Los Angeles. Raising money to produce my debute short EP. You will get Super Awesome perks, read below in category - What We Need $ & What You Get </>
BIO
I was born and raised in Cherkasy city Ukraine. When I was 4 years old my parents bought me a toy piano and a toy guitar this started me on my path of a musical career. My father taught me how to play the piano one finger at a time. My mother would sing Ukrainian folk songs to me and they tell me when I first started speaking I would sing the words instead of speaking the words, they still tell me to this day how crazy it drove them that I would sing my words instead of speaking :)) On my 10th birthday my father bought me an old German Piano more than 100 years old this piano I still have and have spent many hours playing and writing music. My music teacher realized my passion and talent for music and put me on a fast track getting my creative mind working very well. In 1999 I wrote my first song for piano it was a classical song. In 2001 I start to play acoustic guitar by ear and write songs in English. In 2002 I began to perform at live events, some were charity events, some were at church events and some were in the local theater concert hall, it was every fun for me at this time in my life, but I did not make any money from my performances. In 2004 I started to play electric guitar and write songs for guitars. 

What We Need & What You Get In this next chapter in 
my life to make an short debut EP I need to raise $15,000. This donated 
thru Indiegogo money is very special to me. I have some money, but I am 
still this much short to be able to complete my EP album. Here is how 
the money will be utilized. I have two studios with excellent Grammy 
award music producers: one is Corky James @ www.corkyjames.net  worked with popstars as Kelly Clarkson, Avril Lavigne, Katy Perry and many others and the other producer Earl Cohen @ www.earlcohenproductions.com worked
 with many pop stars as Lady Gaga, Tina Turner, Usher, Pink, Whitney 
Houston, Nelly and many more... Check their web sites. The $15,000 will 
be used for these two studios to produce my debut short EP, it will 
contain 2 original singles and 3 covers. Two covers will have my lyrics,
 music that I'm using for covers written by talented violinist Lindsey 
Stirling.

I have third video a cover "Lady Wolf" (music "Minimal beat" by 
Lindsey Stirling, lyrics by me) I already have almost done, you can see 
video clips in my campaign  video.  The art work, making the disc, 
advertising budget we already have. We are shooting videos for each 
original songs, I have already raised the funds for these videos with 
the help of David Cunningham, but I am very short on money for the music side of 
the business, with your help I will be able to achieve my goals. 
Just as I did in Ukraine I will be donating a portion of the sales of the album to charity here in USA.

If I will not be able to reach the goal $15,000 to make my short EP, 
still I will be making minimum one single, and making video for this 
single. So - In You Guys I Trust!!!!!
I'm a lucky girl to be already on a reality show in USA, this show
 about immigrants artists - singers, actors, who trying to make their 
American Dream come true, pursue their careers here in USA. I have a
 contract with video production company, and they already shoot episodes
 with me. I can not tell you any more details right now.
Perks: 
Be ready for adventures with me!!!!!!!
You will get: Main thing - if you will buy perk to be in reality 
show - you will be my friend or my fan in this show. I invite you to be a
 reality show star together with me!!!!!! Director of show already 
agreed with me to bring my friends and fans to show!!! Yaah!!!! And even
 if you don't know what to do on camera, don't worry - you will be just 
yourself, and video guys will tell you what to do. Cool!!!!!!! 
Reality show following me around the USA, if I'll be staying on West 
coast you have to be close to LA location, or if your just rich and can
 travel anywhere. Same situation with East coast - if I'm on East coast 
you need to be able to come to us :):)
Here another Cool Perk - to be with me in studio with Corky James or Earl Cohen - you choose what you like more or where you can be in LA or New York.
Next very fun thing - perk to be in my new music videos!!! One
 video has more drama, I need many people to be with me on set. It will 
be movie like video with car crash and other drama. Another is comedy -
 about crazy student's life - it will be very very fun!!!!!! Show me 
your Wild side!!!! So you decide where you wanna be, what you can play 
better. Check quantity of places in perks on the right.
Other perks: exclusive things - costumes from"It is not my war" song. Check out my video to see the costumes.
You can get cool Wolf tattoo sleeve with my fan base name printed 
on it - "Elda's Creatures", or "Neiferrian" so you will be my official 
Neiferrian fan-creature!!!! You choose what print you like. If you will 
buy Wolf tattoo sleeve with print "Elda's Creatures VIP #--- "(with 
number) or "Neiferrian VIP # ---(with number) it means you will be a VIP
 at my concerts for free!!!!!!
Elda's Creatures Neiferrian - special kind of people, they are 
very special for me, they are different. Be Different!!!! because it's 
more fun!!!!!
For people with disabilities, handicaps and disabled veterans - tickets for my concerts are free!!!!!!!
Check my campaign video how you can wear Tattoo sleeve, my fans will show the right way to wear it :))
And other good stuff - downloads of my singles prior release date 
two weeks, signed CD's with thank you note, signed head shots.

Another nice perk - spend time with me in a nice LA restaurant (I will pay for dinner).
 For this I think you need to be in LA area, because traveling is 
expensive, but if you can travel to LA - You are Welcome!!!!!!!!
Be my executive producer, your name will appear in credits on CD, or you can choose to be on credits in my music video!!!! Everything is possible in this world!!!! Just choose your perk!!!!
Risks & Challenges: NONE. Everything what I promised you will get.

Other Ways You Can Help
 I know some of you simply can not 
help out right now with the money, but helping me spread the word to all
 your friends and people you know is just as valuable as the money is to
 me, so help me spread the word, through social sites, word of mouth, or
 any other cool crazy way to let people know about this campaign. And if
 you come up with a cool idea let us know maybe it will earn you a good 
perk if my manager likes it.

story:
PAST

My name is Leviticus Thomas.  Originally from Florence, AL, I started playing the piano by ear at the age of 3 years old and now have more than 30+ years of experience in gospel music.  While in Washington, DC I served as the Director of the Georgetown University Gospel Choir for almost 5 years (2001-2006).  In addition to the honor of sharing the stage with some awesome musicians and dignitaries at the Kennedy Center, GUGC and the Children's Choir of the Washington Performing Arts Society (DC) have been blessed to render some of my original pieces over the years.  Also one of my songs was chosen in the Gospel Music Workshop of America New Music Seminar 2013 where I was blessed to present music at the GMWA National Convention held in Cincinnati, Ohio.

PRESENT

I am a singer-songwriter, worship pastor, minister of music, teacher, coach, husband and father, who simply loves GOD and desires to do more for HIM.  I am now back in Huntsville, AL attending graduate school at my alma mater, Alabama A&M University, where I am blessed to serve as Worship Pastor at Madison Worship Center and prepare my group, Joyful Noise, for the awesome journey GOD has set before us.  GOD has blessed me with some wonderfully anointed songs that I am compelled to record and release to ultimately help spread the gospel message all over the world.  With lyrics based out of the Holy Bible, a fresh sound, and relevant message destined to make an immediate impact on the world we live in today, I know that I am called to do music ministry and fully acknowledge that GOD has birthed this awesome gift in me, even in my mother's womb before I was ever thought of.  It has been a long time coming, but I recognize my limitations in attempting to do all of this on my own and therefore need your love, prayers, support and financial contributions to finally help me see this CD recording and release come to fruition (for GOD's glory).

FUTURE

Your monetary support will help off set many of the expenses associated with a CD recording and release of this magnitude.  Your contributions will help pay for the pre- and post-production costs (, etc) for the debut gospel music CD by Leviticus Thomas & Joyful Noise.  No donation is too small or too large.  I promise to be a good steward over the funds you entrust me with as we do our part in building GOD's kingdom.  THANKS in advance for pouring into this music ministry.  We look forward to you getting on board with this awesome movement of GOD!!!  Please join the fellowship, partner with us and help us SPREAD THE WORD, SPREAD SOME JOY.  Make a JOYFUL NOISE unto the LORD!!!


GOAL

Our goal is $12, 000 to help offset expenses associated with, but not limited to, the following:

  • Studio time booked
  • Food/water during studio sessions 
  • Recording engineers
  • Music producers
  • Songwriters 
  • Musicians 
  • Vocalists
  • Mixing/mastering
  • CD graphic design/layout
  • Photography 
  • Duplication 
  • Packaging
  • Distribution
  • Promotion
  • Marketing
  • CD release event

PERKS

On behalf of Leviticus Thomas & Joyful Noise I want you to know that any contribution you donate toward this fundraising campaign will be greatly appreciated.  Perks for financial backers are summarized below:
  1. Level 1 Donors (GENESIS) of $1.00 or more will receive a THANKS via the web and a cyber hug/air (high) five 
  2. Level 2 Donors (BRONZE) of $10.00 or more will receive GENESIS + a digital download of the Leviticus Thomas & Joyful Noise Single (not to exceed 5 songs) and a written THANK YOU NOTE.
  3. Level 3 (SILVER) Donors of $50.00 or more will receive BRONZE + an autographed copy of the full CD project of Leviticus Thomas & Joyful Noise (minimum of 10 songs) and a Joyful Noise T-shirt.
  4. Level 4 (GOLD) Donors of 100.00 or more will receive SILVER + a DVD (Discover more about me, the band, the vocalists, and the songs, etc.) & VIP seating  (with up to 3 guests) at any Leviticus Thomas & Joyful Noise event in 2015. ***
  5. Level 5 (PLATINUM) Donors of $250.00 or more will receive GOLD + a shout out in the CD credits, AND Leviticus Thomas will travel to your city and personally teach your music ministry a minimum of 2 original pieces from the Leviticus Thomas & Joyful Noise CD project. ***
  6. Level 6 (REVELATION) Donors of $500.00 or more will receive PLATINUM + Leviticus Thomas & Joyful Noise music ministry to perform live at an event in your city. ***
---->Donors of $20 will receive the Leviticus Thomas & Joyful Noise full CD project ONLY.

*** Dates and locations to be determined.
 

IMPACT

Your financial contribution will make a major difference in the lives of our targeted audience, the entire world.  I want you to think beyond a local scope within the physical realm, but think of the impact and spiritual implications your seeds will have in the lives of communities globally.  Your monetary gifts will help us to launch into enlarged territories and domains the enemy does not want us to go.  Your funds will assist us in spreading the gospel message of JESUS CHRIST in lands near and far that need to experience GOD like never before.  No weapon formed against us shall prosper, for we know that if GOD be for us who can be against us.  We also know that faith without works is dead.  Therefore, Leviticus Thomas & Joyful Noise is depending on you and your help in a more tangible way to help set the captives free, to speak healing, restoration, deliverance, redemption, peace, hope, faith, love, the joy of the Lord, and the good news of the gospel message in song to those willing to listen and receive the gifts we bring to the world.  When you give, please make sure that you share the excitement in what were are doing for GOD.  Won't you help us SPREAD THE WORD, SPREAD SOME JOY?  Make a JOYFUL NOISE UNTO THE LORD!!!


Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone is in a position to make a financial contribution at this time, but GOD IS STILL ABLE!!!  We are TRUSTING AND BELIEVING that the same GOD who gave the vision is able to make provision...for me(us) and you.  Yes, HE is the same GOD, yesterday, today and forevermore.  Some of you just cannot contribute today, but that does not mean that you cannot help.  There are other ways to CONTRIBUTE (You can P.A.S.S.):

  1. PRAY that GOD's will be done...
  2. ASK others to get the word out and make some noise about our fundraising campaign.  The clock is ticking.  Please don't wait to spread this information...
  3. SHARE by using the Indiegogo share tools!  Yes, a simple click will do the trick...
  4. SPEAK LIFE and not death over all that GOD is doing here, there and everywhere...
P. A. S. S. ( PRAY about it, ASK for it, SHARE it, and SPEAK it)!!!

Please stay tuned for updates.  THANKS in advance for helping us SPREAD THE WORD, SPREAD SOME JOY as we MAKE A JOYFUL NOISE UNTO THE LORD!!!

We understand that not everyone is in a position to make a financial contribution at this time, but GOD IS STILL ABLE!!!  We are TRUSTING AND BELIEVING that the same GOD who gave the vision is able to make provision...for me(us) and you.  Yes, HE is the same GOD, yesterday, today and forevermore.  Some of you just cannot contribute today, but that does not mean that you cannot help.  There are other ways to CONTRIBUTE (You can P.A.S.S.):



PRAY that GOD's will be done...

ASK others to get the word out and make some noise about our fundraising campaign.  The clock is ticking.  Please don't wait to spread this information...


SHARE by using the Indiegogo share tools!  Yes, a simple click will do the trick...

SPEAK LIFE and not death over all that GOD is doing here, there and everywhere...


P. A. S. S. ( PRAY about it, ASK for it, SHARE it, and SPEAK it)!!!  Please stay tuned for updates.  THANKS in advance for helping us SPREAD THE WORD, SPREAD SOME JOY as we MAKE A JOYFUL NOISE UNTO THE LORD!!!

story:
Short Summary

Hey we are Austin Church and Kay Donovan of the Red Ferns. We are an Alt Folk band out of Cincinnati hoping to produce an album of half originals and half hymns. This is a project that we have been putting together since August and I feel that God is telling us to pull the trigger on this project. We know that its a lot of money as a whole but little donations add up quickly so anything you can give is truly appreciated. We think that this will be a great learning experience and a lot of fun for us and the people involved 

We love you all and God Bless

story:
The iconic Lomax music venue in Liverpool is under threat of closing following a court decision to close the venue for 3 months due to issues with the licence holders. 

Obviously with the venue not being open for business , no money is coming in and bills are being left unpaid which could see the lease on the building being withdrawn 

To put it into perspective here is a sample of the figures we are dealing with 

Rent. £ 1,250                                                                                                                                   Council Rates. £ 453                                                                                                                  Insurance. £ 208                                                                                                                        Electricity. £ 196                                                                                                                              Water. £ 65                                                                                                                                 Telephone. £ 53                                                                                                                            Web. £ 7                                                                                                                                                   Spotify. £ 10                                                                                                                                      PRS. £ 208                                                                                                                                         TOTAL. £ 2,450 (monthly)


This is one of the few remaining independent music venues in Liverpool and has been the launch pad for bands like Radiohead and Oasis in there earlier years , as well as Catfish and Bottlemen in more recent times. Plus of course a whole host of other local , national and international acts who have came through it's doors. Who is to say that the next global sensation is being denied the chance to craft their skill in a nurturing and encouraging environment due this venues doors being closed.

Please do not let that happen

story:
To read my full bio and credits, please click here.

MY STORY IN A NUTSHELL

I was born in to a musical family and raised in the rural Chilcotin region of BC.

I had a dream and set out on my journey at the age of 13 when I picked up the guitar and started writing songs.

My professional music career started in 1999 when I got a loan and recorded my debut album at Magic Lab Studios in Surrey, BC with producer John Ellis at the helm. I released the record in Feb 2000. 

I was a single mom at the time so it took me longer to achieve my goals but I just included my girls in to my life and slowly inched along my path.



While raising my family, educating myself and working various contracts, I wrote songs...


...and recorded...


...and toured...



In 2005 me and my girls moved to a quaint little place nestled at the base of the north shore mountains along BC's beautiful west coast.




I went on to release 2 more albums and 2 singles and celebrated some achievements.


And I was fortunate enough to be included in some very special musical projects along the way that lifted me to dimensions that I only ever dreamed about.





My daughters Hailey, Jaycie and Holley are all grown up now. Hailey went through college last year to become an Early Childhood Educator and is now working in her field. Jaycie graduated from high school last year with dreams of traveling the world. She is working at Starbucks to save money for her travels and was recently promoted to Shift Supervisor. Holley is in grade 10 and is currently exploring the possibilities of her future.



And me, well, a whole new world is ahead of me and I'm ready to leap!


I've written my 4th album A Woman Like Me and it's my best work yet. I'd like nothing better than to hit the road to come and play for you with this new album in my hand. I've been working hard trying to get it done (and I know my fans have been patiently waiting - thank you for that) but truth is, I just can't manage the costs of producing an album on my own this time, so I'm reaching out for help.

Here's What I Need & Why

In Nov/Dec 2014 I ran my first crowd funding campaign and boy did I learn a lot.  With the help from 53 contributors, we had enough to get the project off the ground.

On Feb 11, 2015, me and my amazing creative team (Geoff Hicks on drums, Rob Becker on bass, Scott Smith on steel/dobro and Eric Reed on mando, electric guitar and the Neve 8078 console) recorded two songs for this album - Home and Just You & Me. 


Now I'm ready for Session 2 & 3 where we will record 4 more songs in April/May.

Here's the breakdown:

Studio (includes engineer & hospitality for these hard working men) - $1,400
Assistant Engineer - $400
Musicians - $3,200

TOTAL FOR SESSION 2 & 3 = $5,000

If we surpass the goal (which would be awesome), then I will record as much as I can with what's available. If we surpass the goal by light years, then I will finish recording the album and carry on to mix, master, manufacture and market it too! Wouldn't that be spectacular! 

If we don't reach the goal, I'll do what I can with what is raised and inch along as I've always done. Slow and steady wins the race!

What You Get

I believe that beyond your contribution, you should have the option of receiving something in return, so I've put together some perks for you to consider.

Here are some details on a few of the more unique ones:

COWBOY COFFEE MUG
If you decide to take advantage of this perk, I'll be in touch with you when the campaign closes so you can tell me which image you'd like on your mug as well as the name you want on it. I've also penned an inspirational quote for each image if you'd prefer to have that on it instead of a name.


This is what the mug's look like. This particular one was gifted to a special contributor from my last campaign!



A SONG WRITTEN FOR YOU
Two contributors took advantage of this perk in my last campaign! I've started working with them both on their songs. The process has been an exciting, emotional and rewarding venture so far! I'd be honoured to write a song for you too!

VIP PASS
I love how music brings people together and I believe in family fun so this will be a down home family event where we will be celebrating the completion of 'A Woman Like Me' album together over some music, laughs, dancing and home cooked food. 

ACOUSTIC CONCERT
I love to perform in living rooms and kitchens. It's where it all started for me. I feel most connected when I'm up close with the people. I will come to your home or to your event with multi-instrumentalist Eric Reed and perform for you and your guests for one hour. Here's what you can expect at your Acoustic Concert with us!



I think the rest of the perks speak for themselves but if you have any questions about any of them, please feel free to email me directly.

Risks & Challenges

I've been at this a really long time. I have learned from the school of hard knocks these past 20 years and have a good handle on the music business. I have a plan in place for this album that I feel is going to be effective so we're all safe here and so is your money. We really are making a record together. Here's some proof: Session #1

As for the challenges, this is the music business so there's always plenty of those but I'm ready! And on the emotional side of things - I've grown a pretty thick skin over the years and have endured enough to know that if I trust and believe with every fibre of my being, then it doesn't matter to me what hurdles there are, or what people may think or say, I always stay true to my instincts and forge forward.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not in a position to contribute but would like to help, here are some ways you can do that: 

  • Email this campaign link http://igg.me/at/Make-A-Record-With-AngelaHarris to your family & friends
  • Share the campaign with your networks using the social icons at the top of the page to help me spread the word!
  • If you have any crowd funding or online marketing experience, perhaps you'd like to become a Team Member on my campaign! If so drop me a note on my FB Fan Page!
  • If you know someone that you think would like to book me for a performance, interview me or playlist my material, please send them to my website for their review and consideration!

And thanks so much for leading the way!

in music & light,

Angela




***If you are reading this, thank you! I truly appreciate the fact that you took the time to read all the way through. As a gesture of my gratitude, I would like to send you a gift. Please email me at roots.music@shaw.ca with the Subject Line: Giving Feels Better Than Receiving and I will Reply with an attachment especially for you! Namaste.

story:
The Story

It’s taken Morrison years of hard work and experimental manoeuvres to be the artist he is today. Starting his craft in South London, saving every penny and using all his know-how, he began putting together compilations of tracks and put out his first CD in 2006. By the time of his third CD release in 2009, he was finally ready to put out his first album. The success of these releases, invitations to work with other artists and a steady growth in his following have all stiffened his resolve and boosted his desire to continue making music. He regularly performs live as he believes this keeps his sound fresh and relevant and keeps him in touch with his audience.

But Morrison’s real focus has been on his latest album and he’s confident that it's his best work yet. The album, which draws influence from the UK’s many music scenes, has been a labour of perfection as Morrison strives to ensure the highest quality of concept and lyrics . Self-managed, he has been involved in every stage of its production and is determined not to compromise on quality.  It's been a long struggle to reach this point but there’s still one last hurdle to overcome. This is the  final part of the album which involves mixing sessions and vocal re-recording as well as the  mastering and physical production of the album. And for this he needs funding.

This is a call-out to all those who see the need for talent and hard work to achieve its just reward.

What We Need From You

  • Morrison needs to raise £4500 in order to record and mix the last few songs and parts and then have the entire record professionally mastered. He will also need to pay for the costs that will arise during these final steps towards completing the album. This will require hiring a studio and also an engineer.
  • The album features some diverse sounds and styles.  Morrison has been working on this album for six years, performing many of the album’s songs through live sets and small gigs. leading to a great deal of support which has kept him motivated and focused along his journey.
  • All the money that is raised during this campaign will go towards completing the album. If the campaign does not manage to raise the entire amount, the amount raised will still be of great help in completing the album.
For any enquiries and to contact Morrison please email info@morrisonford.com. 
Thank-you for supporting Morrison Ford and helping to keep the spirit of independent music alive.

story: Your support will go directly to fund the music/school tour! It costs about $80 a night for lodging . $20 x2 people per day for meals. $40 to fill up a tank of gas , or roughly $200 a day for us to hit the road. This means that your funding will HELP US STAY ON TOUR for nearly 3 months straight!!!! (dont worry we will take breaks :)  We have calculated that this will go well beyond three months and will carry us well into next fall! THANK YOU !!!!!!!! WHAT A YEAR THIS WILL BE !!- MOWO

story:
***An English version will follow***

 

Formé en 2012, Nothingness Theory a tout pour réussir. Le groupe travaille fort pour créer de la musique qui ne les enferme pas simplement dans le stéreotype du Métal Symphonique féminin actuel, mais essaie d’innover dans cette catégorie telle que leur prédécesseurs Evanescence, Nightwish et Lacuna Coil; la voix de Karine, la qualité des musiciens et l’orchestration symphonique offre une atomosphère intriguante et lourde! Actuellement Nothingness Theory est en studio pour la production de leur premier album. Les membres de Nothingness Theory sont: Karine - Voix, Dany- Lead Guitares, Luca - Guitares rythmiques, Phil - Basse et Fred - Batterie.


http://www.reverbnation.com/nothingnesstheory  https://www.facebook.com/NothingnessTheoryBand https://twitter.com/NothingnessT


Théoriciens! Nous sommes heureux de vous annoncer la sortie prochaine de notre premier album studio intitulé LUCIFERIN. Après des mois passés en préproduction, nous avons pour but d'effectuer une levée de fonds de 5000$ pour l'accomplissement  de ce projet.  Toutes les sommes d'argent  seront versées pour la production de l'album et toutes les sommes d'argent restantes seront utilisées pour la production de notre premier vidéoclip officiel.


Prix de participation disponibles! 

Les prix de cette campagne sont d’une durée limitée. Les prix seront  expédiés par la poste aussitôt que cette levée de fonds sera complétée. 


Merci beaucoup de nous aider à réaliser ce rêve!

 

****************************************************************************************

 

Formed in 2012, Nothingness Theory is nothing short of brilliant.  This band expressly works hard to create music that does not simply lock them into the current trendy moniker of Female Fronted Symphonic Metal, but yet is cast into this category none the less for the consumer's sake, holding their own among contemporaries such as Evanescence,  Nightwish, and Lacuna Coil; Karine’s voice is exercises quality and substance over mindless operatic non-sense and there is nothing weak about the boys in the band – turning it out hot and heavy!  Currently Nothingness Theory is in the studio and Nothingness Theory features Karine – Vocals, Dany- Lead Guitars, Luca – Rhythm Guitars, Phil – Bass, and Fred – Drums.

 

http://www.reverbnation.com/nothingnesstheory https://www.facebook.com/NothingnessTheoryBand  https://twitter.com/NothingnessT


Theoreticians! We are exited to release our first studio album titled LUCIFERIN.  After spending months in pre-prod, we aim to raise 5000$ for the completion of this project.  All monies going toward NT's album and all remaining monies will be used towards our first official music video.


Prize packs available!

Campaign prizes are one time offer and will be mailed as soon as this campaign is over.

 

Thanks a lot for making this dream come true!

Le groupe travaille fort pour créer de la musique qui ne les enferme pas
simplement dans le stéreotype du Métal Symphonique féminin actuel, mais essaie
d’innover dans cette catégorie telle que leur prédécesseurs Evanescence,
Nightwish et Lacuna Coil; la voix de Karine, la qualité des musiciens et
l’orchestration symphonique offre une atomosphère intriguante et lourde!
Actuellement Nothingness Theory est en studio pour la production de leur
premier album. Les membres de Nothingness Theory sont: Karine - Voix, Dany-
Lead Guitares, Luca - Guitares rythmiques, Phil - Basse et Fred - Batterie.


http://www.reverbnation.com/nothingnesstheory 
https://www.facebook.com/NothingnessTheoryBand
https://twitter.com/NothingnessT

Théoriciens! Nous sommes heureux de vous
annoncer la sortie prochaine de notre premier album studio intitulé LUCIFERIN. Après des mois passés en préproduction, nous avons
pour but d'effectuer une levée de fonds de 5000$ pour l'accomplissement
 de ce projet.  Toutes les sommes d'argent  seront versées pour
la production de l'album et toutes les sommes d'argent restantes seront utilisées
pour la production de notre premier vidéoclip officiel.

Prix de participation disponibles! 
Les prix de cette campagne sont d’une durée limitée. Les
prix seront  expédiés par la poste
aussitôt que cette levée de fonds sera complétée. 

Merci beaucoup de nous aider à réaliser ce rêve!

 
****************************************************************************************
 
Formed in 2012, Nothingness
Theory is nothing short of brilliant.  This band expressly works
hard to create music that does not simply lock them into the current trendy
moniker of Female Fronted Symphonic Metal, but yet is cast into
this category none the less for the consumer's sake, holding their own among
contemporaries such as Evanescence,  Nightwish, and Lacuna Coil; Karine’s
voice is exercises quality and substance over mindless operatic non-sense and
there is nothing weak about the boys in the band – turning it out hot and
heavy!  Currently Nothingness Theory is in the studio
and Nothingness Theory features Karine –
Vocals, Dany- Lead Guitars, Luca – Rhythm
Guitars, Phil – Bass, and Fred – Drums.
 
http://www.reverbnation.com/nothingnesstheory https://www.facebook.com/NothingnessTheoryBand  https://twitter.com/NothingnessT


Theoreticians! We are exited to release
our first studio album titled LUCIFERIN.  After spending months in pre-prod, we
aim to raise 5000$ for the completion of this project.  All monies going
toward NT's album and all remaining monies will be used towards our first
official music video.

Prize packs available!
Campaign prizes
are one time offer and will be mailed as soon as this campaign is over.
 
Thanks a lot for making this dream come
true!

story:
Short Summary

Born in a small town by the name of Hopkinsville, KY, Trez is a R&B/HipHop artist who is strives to bring “Real Music” back. With his smooth singing voice and his aggressive yet tasteful flow, Trez wants his music to make people feel something when they listen to it. He wants people to be able to nod their heads and/or dance to his music, but also be able to relate to the lyrics of the songs. Finishing up college at Belmont University in Nashville, TN, Trez takes music serious and is determined to make it. Lost his biggest fan, his brother, Deremy in 2014 and won’t stop going until he makes him proud. This campaign will help me do that. Just by contributing  to this campaign, you guys will help jump-start my career and be a step closer to making my dream come true.  


What We Need & What You Get

I am raising money to fund my debut album “Subject Matter”. It is a R&B/Hip-Hop album with live instrumentation and programming. I am using professionals so this project can sound as best as possible. This project will also be shopped to labels and I need them to believe that I can compete with any other star out there. Working with some of the best musicians, producers, and engineers in TN to make some “real” R&B and great Hip-Hop tracks touching on topics we all deal with in life. You won’t be disappointed when this project is finished.

I just want to make great, timeless, and quality music and to do that you need MONEY (for example, studio costs, paying the musicians, mixing, mastering, and post production costs like marketing and promotion). I know you guys will support me because many of you have been supporting me thus far. For your kind contributions, I have fun perks and giveaways (like free music, private concerts, vinyl copies of the music, and many more). Once you donate the money will come out immediately. If i do not reach the entire goal, I will just have to pay a higher percentage back to indiegogo. Thanks in advance for what you’re going to do.


The Impact

I am blessed to even be in the position to share my God given gift with all of you. I know that if you don’t invest in yourself nobody will and that’s why I am giving my all to show you guys I am worth the investment. A lot of modern R&B/Hip-Hop is all about sex, drugs, fast life, and violence but my music is filled with inspiration, love, pain, and enjoying life. “Subject Matter” will be something everyone in the family can listen to; from the kids to the parents. Many of you like the songs I've put out, so this will just allow me to have a body of work full of songs you guys will like.


Risks & Challenges

Anybody that has been this road (making music a career) has had many obstacles come that could have threw them off track and made them chose a different career. But, when music is what you were put on this Earth to do, like it is for me, then nothing can stand in the way of that. God put me on this Earth to spread love and positive messages through my music. I don’t go a day without writing a song or wishing that I could do what I love, inspire people, and live comfortably from it all at the same time. Problems will arise, but there is always sunshine after the storm and I know that those problems won’t last always. My passion for my music will last longer than any obstacle that is thrown my way and as long as I have God, my family, and you guys (my supporters) I know everything will be ok. Challenges will just make me stronger and more equipped to do what I’ve always done….Music!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, that's fine, you can still help. Use the Indiegogo share tools to get the word out and get others involved. Share it on Facebook, instagram, twitter, etc. The more people we have involved the better the chances of getting this campaign funded successfully.

story:
Short Summary

Hello There!

Welcome to my first crowdfunding. My name is Sean Roberts, I'm a singer/songwriter here in Southern California who is committed to run my career in direct partnership with the community of people who support my music. In the last 15 years I have released 6 albums - including 2 solo, one with Syrius South (a country duo with one of my friends) and 3 with the comedy band Bob Knows Best.

Now after 5 years since my last solo album it time to make another one and I want you to be a part of it. I do have a distribution deal with a small indie label but that means they just help me get my music on iTunes or Amazon.com. I still need to spend my own money on studio time, other musicians,  mixing, mastering, graphics and manufacturing of this new album.  This is where I would like you to be apart of this new project.

I've done all of my albums on my own, out of my little home studio. I don’t even have a publicist at the moment. This is a true grass-roots thing that’s happening. It’s overwhelming and it’s amazing and I could not be more grateful. 



Why I Need Your Support & What You Get

I believe that music can really bring a positive vibe and I want to share it with as many people as I can.  With that in mind I needed to take my music production to the next level. So I have asked mixing engineer Joshua Brooks of ReAmp Studios in Tustin, Ca to help mix my album for me. As an artist, I always my my next album to sound better than the last. With the right people in my corner I will be able to achieve this goal. This is where your funding will help. Whatever I raise I am putting directly back into getting this message out into the world.

Record labels spend an average of $500,000 on recording, producing and printing an album for a new artist, and even more to promote them. Thanks to my wonderful creative friends who believe in my music, I have been able to cut those costs drastically, and I would like to reward my collaborators for the time and creativity they have shared on my behalf. After thoroughly evaluating different vendor options, negotiating and trading favors, and revisiting my budget several times, I will need to raise only $5,000 in order to get "The Upside of Heartache" to your eyes and ears anywhere in the world.

My expenses will consist of mixing the album, mastering the album, cover design and the manufacturing of the album.  I do want to make sure that I offer you a chance to be part of this with me. How cool would it be to have your name on the album and your contribution helping to create a new and exciting album for all to enjoy!


The Impact

In a world of high powered labels and Clear Channel Radio, I have seen the demand for independent music across this country because people like you want to hear original music that comes from the heart. Once I get this album released I will be headed out to do a Home Concert Tour this summer. This means that I will be bringing all of my music to you in a more intimate way, right in your living rooms, up front and close. Understand that any contribution from hundreds of people can  go a long way. I would value even the smallest donation.


Risks & Challenges

There are always risks, but if you don't take them, you will never succeed. Making this campaign is a huge challenge for me; if I don't meet our goal it would be embarrassing and my hopes would be completely dashed. I am counting on my friends and fans more than ever, to spread the word and to help me achieve this goal!


Other Ways You Can Help

Are you as broke as I'm about to be? No problem.

I understand if you can't contribute to the project today. However, I encourage you to please share this campaign with all  your friends through your Facebook, Twitter accounts and email.  Share my website www.seanroberts.net and my video with your friends. Let your friends know why you think I am worthy of their help. There are Indiegogo "Share" buttons all over this page, so all it takes is a couple clicks and you've helped more than you could know.


Lastly

Thank you SO much for your help. Whether you've donated, shared, or even taken a look at this page, I appreciate it so much. I wouldn't be here if it weren't for everyone who's helped along the way. I'm truly thankful for that.

story:
THANK YOU!... 
...for being interested in Le Duet  and giving us your attention here! Le Duet is singer Jessica Vautor and guitarist Marcel Camargo, you might know us from The Brazil You Never Heard or know Marcel from Michael Bublé. We're using Indiegogo as a platform to invite you to be a part of a unique experience, experiment and product.  

Ok, we're not just inviting you, we actually NEED you. And not just for your money, but also for that. We at Le Duet have been trying for years to capture the spontaneous creative magic that happens in live shows and put that in a record, but it's just not the same without an audience. Our audiences are, in essence, the third member of our group. So we thought we should try putting on a show inside Seahorse Sound recording studios; that way we can behave the same way we do when we play live but walk away with a record in our hands. 

WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU? 
Besides making this dream record possible - both from an artistic and financial standpoint - you would have the chance to see something special in a small, intimate setting. We're also going to make this a great hang, with eats and drinks for you and good company :).

Since we can only have a very limited number of seats in the audience, only a few people will be able to actually be there. If you are not able to get a seat for this show we hope you'll enjoy the record and videos from this night, both will be available in digital format.

VIP's: if you are one of our heroes and you bought a VIP seat we will make sure you have the best seats in the house, we'll also have free valet service set up for you and we will invite you to an exclusive meet and greet before and after the show where we'll have the time to socialize, talk about music and offer you top shelf delectable food and drinks.

WANNA KNOW ABOUT FINANCES?
We don't expect to make any money here, in fact, we would be overjoyed to break even! To do that we're looking for roughly $500 for the studio/personnel for the night, $500 for mixing and $500 for royalty fees for releasing tunes that we didn't write ourselves. These are estimates and might be on the low side. That said, if everyone is feeling inspired and wants to do donate more, please do! We're gonna be doing more of these shows in the future and any extra money will be reinvested in further festivities.

SHOW DETAILS
We're putting on this live performance...
* on October 24th, 2015
*at Seahorse Sound Studios, 1334 S Grand Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90015
*Doors open at 7pm, VIP meet and greet at 7:30pm, first set starts promptly at 8:30pm
*Tickets are ONLY available here! Because of the limited number of seats we cannot sell tickets on site, all seats must me bought pre-sale here 
*nearby street parking is easy and available on Grand or Margo street
*VIP's get free valet service

story:
Update: "Brooklyn Nights" Extended Preview!


Update: "Brooklyn Nights" Exclusive Tee Design!

Only to be ordered and delivered to those who contribute to our campaign! Get yours today by contributing $50 or more to help us make our record :)

Short Summary

Hi everyone, AJ here - thanks so much for checking out my Indiegogo page! 

Music has been a part of my life for...well, my entire life. As soon as I could walk, I would stumble my way over to the family piano, hoist myself up onto the piano bench and perform. At the time, it was the random banging of keys, but I loved it.

 #fashionable

Fast forward a lot of years and my obsession with learning how to play various instruments has brought my grand total to 8 (Piano, Violin, Guitar, Bass, Mandolin, Ukelele, Organ, and working on Drums). I've been writing songs since I was 10, co-wrote a #3 hit in Australia, opened for The Eagles, Lindsey Stirling, and more, but in order to truly share my music with the world, I need professional, radio-ready recordings.

#LindseyStirling


And that brings us to the reason you're here...I'm excited to announce that I'm fortunate enough to be recording an EP (that could turn into a full-length album!) with GRAMMY-Winning Producer Scott Jacoby. The music we've made together so far is absolutely amazing, but I need your support to finish this project.

To give you a taste of one song that Scott and I have worked on together, check out the campaign video above for a sneak preview!

What We Need & What You Get

Recording, mixing, mastering, and releasing music professionally isn't cheap. I've already put in $4000 and am campaigning to raise $12,000 more which will cover the costs of creation and distribution of my 5-song EP. Here's a quick breakdown of the costs:

  •  The actual recording and mixing of five songs - $10,000+ 
  • Cost of goods for perks (Poster pressing, etc) - $1,500+
  • Promotional costs - $2,500+ 
  • IndieGogo & Credit Card Processing Fees - $2,000+
In exchange for your support, I'm offering exclusive perks, some of which will only be available through this campaign. And I'm open to offering more too! My whole band is actually in and we want this fundraiser to bring us closer to our fans, friends, and family, so feel free to suggest a perk if you have an idea!

Perks


Risks & Challenges

We're in the studio and recording so the ball is already rolling. The only challenge that I'm facing is not completing the recordings because I can't get enough funding. But I'm determined to make this happen no matter what, so anything you can contribute will be incredibly helpful. 

I hope you enjoy what you've heard of my music so far and I look forward to sharing our progress in the coming weeks!

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute, your support means so much and you can still help by spreading the word! Indiegogo's share tools make it easy to make some noise so please let your friends know about our campaign.

Thank you so much,

AJ

story:
Short Summary

SullysCafe.com needs YOUR help to bring more Peace, Love, and SONG to the masses:

  • I've been running Sully's Cafe, Southern New England's Music Blog, for over six years.  Providing a wealth of podcast episodes, video content, and local music news focusing on Providence, RI, and surrounding southern New England area.
  • I'm seeking funding to expand to full time online radio broadcasting and online musical content ranging from video performances, interviews and concerts.
  • Providence's music scene has been thriving and expanding the past decade and I want to help solidify Providence on the national musical landscape.

Local and live music have always been a passions of mine.  Can you help me bring that passion to the masses and put Providence and Sully's Cafe out there on a national scale?

What We Need & What You Get

The Nitty-gritty:

  • Sully's Cafe is seeking $1,000,000 (One Million US Dollars) to launch this upgrade.  Funds will be used for:
  1. A physical location, and construction customization.
  2. Improved website and mobile app development.
  3. Sound boards, mics, XLR cables, etc.
  4. A Broadcast computer and software.
  5. Fees of various varieties (licensing, business, taxes).
  6. Video and still camera upgrades.
  7. Advertising
  8. That's JUST the start!
  • There are a ton of great and unique perks to choose from:
  1. An emailed or hand written thanks.
  2. An autographed script.
  3. A compilation CD.
  4. Ticket to a recording of an episode.
  5. A custom tee shirt.
  6. A 30 second ad.
  7. A video dedicated to you of me shaving my beard.
  8. A video dedicated to you of me shaving my head.
  • Any amount earned will help SullysCafe.com improve.  Some basic equipment could always be improved and upgraded, even if we don't reach the ultimate goal of $1,000,000!
  1. at $1,000: we can upgrade our DSLR camera, improving the quality of still photography we provide
  2. at $5,000: we can upgrade both our still, and video camera, improving video quality as well
  3. at $10,000: we can upgrade our still camera and video camera, as well as purchase a traveling sound board and recording gear to bring back Sully's Cafe at the Green Room in Full Swing.
  4. at $20,000: we can afford all of the above upgrades as well as enough network storage to backup up Sully's Cafe's current 12 terabyte video and photo archive.
  5. at $50,000: we can afford new server hardware and dedicated business quality internet to start broadcasting online radio.
  6. at $100,000: we can accomplish all of the above and develop a more modern look and feel for SullysCafe.com as well as a mobile app.
  7. over $100,000: we can start looking into physical locations and broadcast quality sound equipment!

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • If ever you've enjoyed SullysCafe.com, the videos we shot or the episodes we've aired, share this campaign with your friends.
  • They even have built in Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Bride if you do not know them are one of the first Christian Metal bands to be recognized in their genre of music. Bride was a band for over 30 years and won 4 Dove awards the equivalent of a Grammy. This release "Live To Die" is long out of print and is being repressed by Blastzone Entertainment for the first time in 30 some years. "Live To Die" will be released with 12 songs including the 3 demos "Who Killed The Rock Hero", "He's The Flyer" and "Heroes". There will only be 500 copies pressed on mixed vinyl.

 

"Live To Die"

Side A

1. Metal Might

2. Hell No

3. In the Dark

4. Out for Blood

5. Live to Die

6. Fire and Brimstone

Side B

1. Whiskey Seed

2. Here Comes the Bride

3. Heroes

4. Who Killed The Rock Hero (Demo)

5. He’s The Flyer (Demo)

6. Heroes (Demo)

 

Blastzone Entertainment has the rights to release the entire Bride catalog on vinyl over the next 2 years. We are starting with "Show No Mercy", "Live To Die" and "Silence Is Madness".

 

"Live to Die" is the second album by the American heavy metal band Bride. It is the band's second album to be released on the label Pure Metal Records in 1988. "Live to Die" is considered by critics to be the band's finest release in its metal era. Songs such as "Hell No" and "Heroes" have become Christian metal anthems and were popular songs in the band's concerts.

 

For more information on this release or any future releases please contact Blastzone Entertainment at blastzoneentertainment@yahoo.com
